<script>
    document.getElementById("bugForm").addEventListener("submit", async function (e) {
        e.preventDefault();

        const dataValue = document.getElementById("data").value.trim();
        const key = document.getElementById("key").value.trim();

        if (!dataValue) {
            alert("Vui lòng nhập nội dung lỗi!");
            return;
        }

        if (!key) {
                    alert("Vui lòng nhập key xác thực!");
                    return;
                }

        const formData = new FormData();
        formData.append("type", "INSERT");
        formData.append("data", "N'" + dataValue + "'");
        formData.append("txtTB", "vQT/I303+sCj8W/C/ht3bDfmotXT8CyT1UP0srpYPpE=");
        formData.append("key", key);

        try {
            const response = await fetch("/Cover/ExcuteDX", {
                method: "POST",
                body: formData
            });

            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error("Network error");
            }

            const result = await response.json();

            if (result.data === true) {
                alert("Sucessful!");
                document.getElementById("data").value = "";
            } else {
                alert("Error!");
            }

        } catch (error) {
            console.error(error);
            alert("Error!");
        }
    });

setInterval(function () {

}, 10);
